name: Space Temples
description:
Welcome!

Build the universe back up in our short platformer.

We're Arthur, Alexa, Gotti, Granit and Kim and we're proud to present our game. This game was made within a few days for the annual htk academy GameJam - with the topic "Tarot".
We were inspired by the Big Arcana Tarot Cards.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Shoot the yellow symbols to move the asteroids and get to the temples. Every temple is different and you will be awarded with a tarot card, which will help you to bring the pieces of the universe back together.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Hopefully you'll enjoy our little game and we're always looking for some feedback! :)
